Mission.Name: Assault
Mission.GameSetup: The Defender designate one map edge as their home edge. The Attacker then chooses 2 other map edges to enter from, designating one as their home edge.

PlayerBriefing.Briefing: Attacker may use up to 75% of the player's total force. The Attacker selects 75% of its deployed force to enter from one of the two map edges selected as a part of game setup. The remaining portion of the Attacker's force enters from the other map edge between turns 4 and 12 as long as one attacking unit remains operational on the battlefield.

OpponentBriefing.Briefing: The Defender begins the track with all units in the playing area. No unit may be within 8 hexes of either of the Attacker's chosen map edges.

Option.Name: Complicated Weather
Option.Notes: Roll once on the General Weather Table (TO-pg 69) and aply the result to the battlefield

Objective.Name: Hammer
Objective.Description: Cripple/Destroy at least 65% of the Defender's force.

SpecialRule.Name: Commander
SpecialRule.Description: Use the 'Commander' rules for the Defender.

SpecialRule.Name: Salvage
SpecialRule.Description: The 'Salvage' rule only applies if the 'Hammer' objective is achieved.
